abstract: China is closely watching BHP Billiton’s $38.5 billion bid to acquire one of the world’s biggest producers of potash and fertilizer, the government said Wednesday in its first official comment on the proposed takeover.
snippet: China is closely watching BHP Billiton’s $38.5 billion bid to acquire one of the world’s biggest producers of potash and fertilizer, the government said Wednesday in its first official comment on the proposed takeover.
lead_paragraph: China is closely watching BHP Billiton‘s $38.5 billion bid to acquire one of the world’s biggest producers of potash and fertilizer, the government said Wednesday in its first official comment on the proposed takeover.

headline.main: China ‘Paying Close Attention’ to BHP-Potash Deal
